entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 this evening then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
